verses.verse: Now it came <WH1961> about after <WH310> the death <WH4194> of Joshua <WH3091> that the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> inquired <WH7592> of the Lord, <WH3068> saying, <WH559> "Who <WH4310> shall go <WH5927> up first <WH8462> for us against <WH413> the Canaanites, <WH3669> to fight <WH3898> against them?"
And the Lord <WH3068> said, <WH559> "Judah <WH3063> shall go <WH5927> up; behold, <WH2009> I have given <WH5414> the land <WH776> into his hand. <WH3027>"

Then Judah <WH3063> said <WH559> to Simeon <WH8095> his brother, <WH251> "Come <WH5927> up with me into the territory <WH1486> allotted <WH1486> me, that we may fight <WH3898> against the Canaanites; <WH3669> and I in turn <WH1571> will go <WH1980> with you into the territory <WH1486> allotted <WH1486> you." So Simeon <WH8095> went <WH1980> with him.

And Judah <WH3063> went <WH5927> up, and the Lord <WH3068> gave <WH5414> the Canaanites <WH3669> and the Perizzites <WH6522> into their hands; <WH3027> and they defeated <WH5221> ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> men <WH376> at Bezek. <WH966>
And they found <WH4672> Adoni-bezek <WH966> in Bezek and fought <WH3898> against him and they defeated <WH5221> the Canaanites <WH3669> and the Perizzites. <WH6522>
But Adoni-bezek fled; <WH5127> and they pursued <WH7291> him and caught <WH270> him and cut <WH7112> off <WH7112> his thumbs <WH931> and big <WH931> toes. <WH931> <WH7272>

And Adoni-bezek said, <WH559> "Seventy <WH7657> kings <WH4428> with their thumbs <WH931> and their big <WH931> toes <WH931> <WH7272> cut <WH7112> off <WH7112> used to gather <WH3950> up [scraps] under <WH8478> my table; <WH7979> as I have done, <WH6213> so <WH3651> God <WH430> has repaid <WH9608> me." So they brought <WH935> him to Jerusalem <WH3389> and he died <WH4191> there. <WH8033>

Then the sons <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> fought <WH3898> against Jerusalem <WH3389> and captured <WH3920> it and struck <WH5221> it with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719> and set <WH7971> the city <WH5892> on fire. <WH784>

And afterward <WH310> the sons <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> went <WH3381> down <WH3381> to fight <WH3898> against the Canaanites <WH3669> living <WH3427> in the hill <WH2022> country <WH2022> and in the Negev <WH5045> and in the lowland. <WH8219>

So Judah <WH3063> went <WH1980> against <WH413> the Canaanites <WH3669> who lived <WH3427> in Hebron <WH2275> (now the name <WH8034> of Hebron <WH2275> formerly <WH6440> [was] Kiriath-arba); and they struck <WH5221> Sheshai <WH8344> and Ahiman <WH289> and Talmai. <WH8526>
Then from there <WH8033> he went <WH1980> against <WH413> the inhabitants <WH3427> of Debir <WH1688> (now the name <WH8034> of Debir <WH1688> formerly <WH6440> [was] Kiriath-sepher).
And Caleb <WH3612> said, <WH559> "The one who <WH834> attacks <WH5221> Kiriath-sepher and captures <WH3920> it, I will even give <WH5414> him my daughter <WH1323> Achsah <WH5915> for a wife. <WH802>"

And Othniel <WH6274> the son <WH1121> of Kenaz, <WH7073> Caleb's younger <WH9512> brother, <WH251> captured <WH3920> it; so he gave <WH5414> him his daughter <WH1323> Achsah <WH5915> for a wife. <WH802>

Then it came <WH1961> about when she came <WH935> [to him,] that she persuaded <WH5496> him to ask <WH7592> her father for a field. <WH1> Then she alighted <WH7704> from her donkey, <WH6795> and Caleb <WH2543> said <WH3612> to her, "What <WH559> do you want?"

And she said <WH559> to him, "Give <WH3051> me a blessing, <WH1293> since <WH3588> you have given <WH5414> me the land <WH776> of the Negev, <WH5045> give <WH5414> me also springs <WH1543> of water. <WH4325>" So Caleb <WH3612> gave <WH5414> her the upper <WH5942> springs <WH1543> and the lower <WH8482> springs. <WH1543>

And the descendants <WH1121> of the Kenite, <WH7017> Moses' father-in-law, went <WH5927> up from the city <WH5892> of palms <WH8558> with the sons <WH1121> of Judah, <WH3063> to the wilderness <WH4057> of Judah <WH3063> which <WH834> is in the south <WH5045> of Arad; <WH6166> and they went <WH1980> and lived <WH3427> with the people. <WH5971>

Then Judah <WH3063> went <WH1980> with Simeon <WH8095> his brother, <WH251> and they struck <WH5221> the Canaanites <WH3669> living <WH3427> in Zephath, <WH6857> and utterly <WH2763> destroyed <WH2763> it. So the name <WH8034> of the city <WH5892> was called <WH7121> Hormah. <WH2767>
And Judah <WH3063> took <WH3920> Gaza <WH5804> with its territory <WH1366> and Ashkelon <WH831> with its territory <WH1366> and Ekron <WH6138> with its territory. <WH1366>

Now the Lord <WH3068> was with Judah, <WH3063> and they took <WH3423> possession <WH3423> of the hill <WH2022> country; <WH2022> but they could not drive <WH3423> out the inhabitants <WH3427> of the valley <WH6010> because <WH3588> they had iron <WH1270> chariots. <WH7393>
Then they gave <WH5414> Hebron <WH2275> to Caleb, <WH3612> as Moses <WH4872> had promised; <WH1696> and he drove <WH3423> out from there <WH8033> the three <WH7969> sons <WH1121> of Anak. <WH6061>

But the sons <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144> did not drive <WH3423> out the Jebusites <WH2983> who lived <WH3427> in Jerusalem; <WH3389> so the Jebusites <WH2983> have lived <WH3427> with the sons <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144> in Jerusalem <WH3389> to this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>
Likewise the house <WH1004> of Joseph <WH3130> went <WH5927> up against Bethel, <WH1008> and the Lord <WH3068> was with them.
And the house <WH1004> of Joseph <WH3130> spied <WH8446> out Bethel <WH1008> (now the name <WH8034> of the city <WH5892> was formerly <WH6440> Luz <WH3870>).

And the spies <WH8104> saw <WH7200> a man <WH376> coming <WH3318> out of the city, <WH5892> and they said <WH559> to him, "Please <WH4994> show <WH7200> us the entrance <WH3996> to the city <WH5892> and we will treat <WH6213> you kindly. <WH2617>"

So he showed <WH7200> them the entrance <WH3996> to the city, <WH5892> and they struck <WH5221> the city <WH5892> with the edge <WH6310> of the sword, <WH2719> but they let <WH7971> the man <WH376> and all <WH3605> his family <WH4940> go <WH7971> free. <WH7971>

And the man <WH376> went <WH1980> into the land <WH776> of the Hittites <WH2850> and built <WH1129> a city <WH5892> and named <WH7121> <WH8034> it Luz <WH3870> which <WH1931> is its name <WH8034> to this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>

But Manasseh <WH4519> did not take <WH3423> possession <WH3423> of Beth-shean and its villages, <WH1323> or Taanach <WH8590> and its villages, <WH1323> or the inhabitants <WH3427> of Dor <WH1756> and its villages, <WH1323> or the inhabitants <WH3427> of Ibleam <WH2991> and its villages, <WH1323> or the inhabitants <WH3427> of Megiddo <WH4023> and its villages; <WH1323> so the Canaanites <WH3669> persisted <WH2974> in living <WH3427> in that land. <WH776>

And it came <WH1961> about when <WH3588> Israel <WH3478> became <WH2388> strong, <WH2388> that they put <WH7760> the Canaanites <WH3669> to forced <WH4522> labor, <WH4522> but they did not drive <WH3423> them out completely. <WH3423>

Neither <WH3808> did Ephraim <WH669> drive <WH3423> out the Canaanites <WH3669> who were living <WH3427> in Gezer; <WH1507> so the Canaanites <WH3669> lived <WH3427> in Gezer <WH1507> among <WH7130> them.

Zebulun <WH2074> did not drive <WH3423> out the inhabitants <WH3427> of Kitron, <WH7003> or the inhabitants <WH3427> of Nahalol; <WH5096> so the Canaanites <WH3669> lived <WH3427> among <WH7130> them and became <WH1961> subject to forced <WH4522> labor. <WH4522>

Asher <WH836> did not drive <WH3423> out the inhabitants <WH3427> of Acco, <WH5910> or the inhabitants <WH3427> of Sidon, <WH6721> or of Ahlab, <WH303> or of Achzib, <WH392> or of Helbah, <WH2462> or of Aphik, <WH663> or of Rehob. <WH7340>
So the Asherites <WH843> lived <WH3427> among <WH7130> the Canaanites, <WH3669> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land; <WH776> for they did not drive <WH3423> them out.

Naphtali <WH5321> did not drive <WH3423> out the inhabitants <WH3427> of Beth-shemesh, or the inhabitants <WH3427> of Beth-anath, but lived <WH3427> among <WH7130> the Canaanites, <WH3669> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land; <WH776> and the inhabitants <WH3427> of Beth-shemesh and Beth-anath became <WH1961> forced <WH4522> labor <WH4522> for them.

Then the Amorites <WH567> forced <WH3905> the sons <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> into the hill <WH2022> country, <WH2022> for they did not allow <WH5414> them to come <WH3381> down <WH3381> to the valley; <WH6010>

yet the Amorites <WH567> persisted <WH2974> in living <WH3427> in Mount <WH2022> Heres, <WH2776> in Aijalon <WH357> and in Shaalbim; <WH8169> but when the power <WH3027> of the house <WH1004> of Joseph <WH3130> grew <WH3513> strong, <WH3513> they became <WH1961> forced <WH4522> labor. <WH4522>
And the border <WH1366> of the Amorites <WH567> ran from the ascent <WH4610> of Akrabbim, <WH4610> from Sela <WH5554> and upward. <WH4605>
